title: New approach could boost energy capacity of lithium batteries

title_detail.value: New approach could boost energy capacity of lithium batteries

summary: Researchers have found a new way to make cathodes for lithium batteries, offering improvements in the amount of power for both a given weight and a given volume.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have found a new way to make cathodes for lithium batteries, offering improvements in the amount of power for both a given weight and a given volume.
